events.message: We have received John Doe's application for the Senior Software Engineer position. His resume highlights significant experience with backend services and cloud infrastructure.
John Doe's application has been categorised under Engineering as a backend developer role involving microservices and DevOps practices.
Recruiter Sarah Smith has been assigned to manage John Doe's application and coordinate the next steps in the hiring process.
The initial screening call with John Doe went well. He demonstrated strong technical knowledge and alignment with the team's technology stack.
John Doe responded promptly confirming his availability for the technical interview next week and expressed enthusiasm for the role.
Technical interview with John Doe has been scheduled for April 18th at 10 AM, focusing on system design and coding challenges.
